content:
'Avenue Q' and 'Hadestown' are both fantastic choices.

To find out if either of these shows are currently running or coming soon to a theater near you, I'd need to know your location. Could you please tell me what city or region you're in?

Alternatively, you can also check online ticketing websites, such as Telecharge or Ticketmaster, or the official websites of local theaters in your area. They usually list upcoming shows, including touring productions and local productions.

Here are some tips to help you find out if 'Avenue Q' or 'Hadestown' are coming to your area:

1. Check the official websites of the shows: [Avenue Q](https://www.avenueq.com/) and [Hadestown](https://www.hadestown.com/).
2. Look for national tours or local productions on ticketing websites like [Telecharge](https://www.telecharge.com/) or [Ticketmaster](https://www.ticketmaster.com/).
3. Search for local theaters in your area and check their upcoming seasons or productions.
4. Follow local theater groups, venues, or arts organizations on social media to stay informed about upcoming shows.

If neither of these shows are currently running or coming soon to your area, I can suggest more musicals or plays that might be of interest to you. Just let me know!
